{"id":1106856141,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1701014859,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1106856141/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Matrix Similarity After Cyclic Shifts","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool areSimilar(vector<vector<int>>& mat, int k) {\n        // Assuming that the test cases have only matrices with even number of columns\n        int m=mat.size(),n=mat[0].size();\n        auto saved=mat;\n        k%=n;\n        while(k--)\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++) {\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j+=2) {\n                swap(mat[i][j],mat[i][j+1]);\n            }\n        }\n        return mat==saved;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"matrix-similarity-after-cyclic-shifts","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
